name: Eduardo David
title: Front-End Developer
introduction: There are many programming languages but, at the end, the best language for the best developer is not machine but human. I believe in teaching and learning, in communication and cooperation to evolve together and create something great.

experience.name: Sopra Steria
experience.description: Consultancy firm. I've worked in some projects, many of them internal (like using polymer and angular2 to create some tools that will help the company or a POC). Currently I am working for Model Bank on ING Spain.

experience.name: Altran
experience.description: Consultancy firm. I joined Altran to become part of a backend project, using Java, Spring, Subversion, Maven, ... Six months after that, we finished it and I had the opportunity to enroll in a frontend education, where I learned Ember, Angular, Node, HTML, CSS, gulp, ... After that we used some of those things to develop an internal app.

experience.name: Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (Distributed Systems Department)
experience.description: Investigation project about load balancing and elastic architectures in a linux environment.
